content: designed for moogly2019cal for mooglyblog com 1 get spun with this fun and colorful pinwheel blanket square each petal is worked out from a center ring then back in to opposite direction without turning to form the raised edges the reverse single_crochet edge is worked into the front loop only leaving the back loop to stitch into for the next petal this idea may have you spinning but follow the instructions step by step and give it a try 1 https //mooglyblog com/cal-2019-4/
